title: How Does Halo Tales Empower People To Fight Corporate Power?
summary: We made Halo Tales help inspire collective action and connect people who still ask us, "What can I do?" It turns out, a lot.
authorBioSummary: The founder of Hello Cool World, and the impact producer behind the film, Katherine Dodds has been working on The Corporation films since 1999.
authorBioFull:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).
takeActionBody:
1. Join Halo Tales and be part of our crowd. Did the film make an impact on you or do you have a comment to make on the issues? Share a short testimonial about how.
  2. Pledge to take action on stories like this one. Then share your pledge on social media. You know the drill.
  3. Join the mail list and sign up for notifications. We’ll be posting stories on a regular basis from allies who have used the film to drive change in their communities. We’ll let you know as soon as they’re up, and give you updates on The Next Corporation film. Closer to the launch we’ll be sharing sneak-peek content, and once the launch is underway we’ll be opening up the app for your stories too!

title: We Heard The Call: The New Corporation Is Underway
summary: We're making a sequel - an unfortunately necessary sequel. Our new story is about how society is changing from having corporations to being corporate.
authorBioSummary: Author of the bestselling book that spawned the first film, as well as the writer and co-creator of the films, Joel is a professor of law at the University of British Columbia. His work examines the social, economic, and political dimensions of law.
authorBioFull:
Joel Bakan is an author, filmmaker and a professor of law at the University of British Columbia whose work examines the social, economic, and political dimensions of law. A former Rhodes Scholar and law clerk to Chief Justice Brian Dickson of the Supreme Court of Canada, with law degrees from the universities of Oxford, Dalhousie, and Harvard, Bakan has won numerous awards for his scholarship and teaching, worked on landmark legal cases and government policy, and served frequently as a media commentator.

His critically acclaimed international hit, The Corporation (Free Press, 2004) – the basis of THE CORPORATION film – electrified readers around the world (it was published in over 20 languages), and became a bestseller in several countries. His latest book, Childhood Under Siege, was released in August 2011 and was also widely translated. Bakan’s highly regarded scholarly work also includes Just Words: Constitutional Rights and Social Wrongs (University of Toronto Press, 1997), as well as textbooks, edited collections, and numerous articles in leading legal and social science journals.

Bakan is an accomplished public speaker who addresses business, government, academic, and activist audiences around the world. Also a professional jazz guitarist, he grew up in East Lansing, Michigan and now lives in Vancouver, Canada with his wife, Rebecca Jenkins.
takeActionBody:
1. Help spread the word about the launch of the new film. Sign up to volunteer and be ready to share our materials when the new film hits theatres. The more buzz we can build, the more impact it will have.
  2. Join our crowd and let us know what you think. Did The Corporation make an impact on you or do you have a comment to make on the issues? For now, you can share a short testimonial when you sign up but if you have more of a tale to tell, especially in video, we’d love to hear from you. Your stories have inspired us. We’d like to share them with the world.

title: The Corporation Inspired Me To Start My Own Movement
summary: Watching the film made me realize how much corporations controlled the levers of power in our society, and I knew I had to do more.
authorBioSummary: Found of the resistance movement, Name1 has been on the frontlines of this issue for over 10 years.
takeActionBody:
1. Support the current campaign We’re rallying people to take a stand in their communities with action peaking at the end of June. Sign a petition and send a letter to your MP to show your support.
  2. Donate to the cause We will, of course, gratefully accept your financial contributions too. Our work wouldn’t be possible without people like you.
